articles.title: Marie-Caroline Compans
articles.contents:
Home
          
          
          Research
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Marie-Caroline Compans
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Welcome!
            I am a postdoctoral research fellow at the Department of
            Demography of the University of Vienna - Wittgenstein
            Centre.
            I mainly work on (late) fertility and assisted reproduction
            in Europe.
            
            Experience
            Postdoctoral research fellow, University
            of Vienna - Wittgenstein Centre | Oct. 2021 - Present
            Ph.D. Candidate, French National
            Institute for Demographic Studies (Ined) | Sept. 2017 - June
            2021
            
            
            Education
            Ph.D. in Demography, University Paris I
            Panthéon-Sorbonne / Ined | Sept. 2017 - June 2021
            Master in Quantitative Sociology and
            Demography (M1&M2), University Paris-Saclay |
            Sept. 2015 - June 2017
            Detailed CV here.
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Marie-Caroline Compans
